channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bernie Sanders, AOC, take aim at Trump and Musk, as well as Democrats, at western rallies
item.description: Bernie Sanders and AOC headline a rally in Tempe, Arizona as part of a three-day, five-city swing through Western states where they took aim at Presid...

item.title: Trump signs executive order aims to streamline federal procurement under GSA
item.description: President Trump has signed an executive order that centralizes federal government procurement under the General Services Administration.

item.title: Husband of former 'Squad' Rep. Cori Bush charged with wire fraud linked to COVID relief funds: DOJ
item.description: The husband of former U.S. Rep. Cori Bush was charged with wire fraud after allegedly accepting pandemic-era funds, federal prosecutors said.

item.title: Pentagon set to award US Air Force's next-generation fighter jet contract, sources say

item.title: Canadian politician claims Trump admin's '51st state' rhetoric is an 'act of war'
item.description: A liberal Canadian member of Parliament said the Trump administration's tariffs and "51st state" rhetoric is an "act of war."

item.title: Greene calls for yanking FDA approval of COVID-19 vaccines: 'Causing permanent harm and deaths'
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene calls for yanking FDA approval of COVID-19 vaccines, says that "COVID-19 vaccines are causing permanent harm and deaths."

item.title: Leftist Nonprofit Tries To Smear Election Integrity Efforts With ‘Hocus-Pocus’ Study
item.description: The CEO of a leftist group claims conservatives funded 'election deniers and anti-voting rights organizations,' citing a questionable study.

item.title: New York’s Highest Court Shoots Down Democrats’ Efforts To Let Noncitizens Vote
item.description: New York’s highest court struck down New York City’s noncitizen voting law as unconstitutional on Thursday. The New York State Court of Appeals ruled ...

item.title: Gang tattoos and hand signs: How ICE identified Venezuelan gang members to deport as terrorists

item.title: New York City's noncitizen voting law ruled illegal by top state court
item.description: New York City's attempt to allow noncitizens to cast ballots in local elections violates the state constitution, the state's top court ruled Thursday.

item.title: Thoughts on Federal Arts Money After President Autopen
item.description: And why wallop libraries? They teach people to think for themselves.

item.title: A Tale of Two Deportation Cases
item.description: In the case of the Venezuelans, the DOJ is resisting the kind of meticulous review that it provided in Mahmoud Khalil’s case.

item.title: Fix VOA, Don’t Kill It
item.description: The goal should be to reinvigorate American public diplomacy.

item.title: The Most Important China Book of the Decade

item.title: Pro-Union Republicans Don’t Get Trump’s Real Appeal
item.description: Democrats have lost the working class in large part because they put unions over workers. Republicans shouldn’t make the same mistake.
